# Why use pip install --no-cache-dir in Docker? (2025-12-04 11:57Z)

_**User (2025-12-04 07:48Z)**_

@Splat-SLAM/.devcontainer/post_exec.sh 为什么要使用 pip install --no-cache-dir 来编译安装Splat-SLAM下的额外依赖库呢，主要是当前执行的时候报错找不到torch，但该镜像就是基于torch构建的呀。

注：原本设计的是该脚本在docker构建的时候就执行： @Splat-SLAM/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json:10 ，但由于网络问题被我改为了手动执行，是不是相关环境变量在docker run时就没了，导致的这个问题，那么如何避免呢

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Ask)**_

\\\n\t\t    chmod +x /cmake-3.22.1-linux-x86_64.sh &amp;&amp; \\\n\t\t    /cmake-3.22.1-linux-x86_64.sh --skip-license --prefix=/usr/local\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n**opencv**：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\nmkdir /opencv &amp;&amp; \\\n    mv opencv-4.8.0.zip /opencv &amp;&amp; \\\n  \t  mv opencv_contrib-4.8.0.zip /opencv &amp;&amp; \\\n  \t  cd /opencv &amp;&amp; \\\n  \t  unzip opencv-4.8.0.zip &amp;&amp; \\\n  \t  unzip opencv_contrib-4.8.0.zip &amp;&amp; \\\n  \t  rm opencv-4.8.0.zip &amp;&amp; rm opencv_contrib-4.8.0.zip\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n**opencv build**（编译opencv时会额外下载一些包，易受网络质量影响，等最终编译结果再做处理）：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\nmkdir /opencv/opencv-4.8.0/build &amp;&amp; cd /opencv/opencv-4.8.0/build &amp;&amp; \\\n\t\t    cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE \\\n          -DWITH_CUDA=ON \\\n          -DWITH_CUDNN=ON \\\n          -DOPENCV_DNN_CUDA=ON \\\n          -DWITH_NVCUVID=ON \\\n          -DCUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR=/usr/local/cuda-11.8 \\\n          -DOPENCV_EXTRA_MODULES_PATH=/opencv/opencv_contrib-4.8.0/modules \\\n          -DBUILD_TIFF=ON \\\n          -DBUILD_ZLIB=ON \\\n          -DBUILD_JASPER=ON \\\n          -DBUILD_JPEG=ON \\\n          -DWITH_FFMPEG=ON \\\n          .. &amp;&amp; \\\n    make -j$(nproc) &amp;&amp; \\\n    make install &amp;&amp; \\\n    ldconfig\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n**libtorch**：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\nmv libtorch-cu118.zip / &amp;&amp; cd / &amp;&amp; \\\n    unzip libtorch-cu118.zip &amp;&amp; rm libtorch-cu118.zip\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n#### 后处理\n\n**添加环境变量**：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\nexport DISPLAY_EXPORT=\"export DISPLAY=:0\"\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n**clone**（置于 **nerf-3dgs-benchmark** 的 **Photo-SLAM**）：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\ngit clone --recursive https://github.com/iis-esslingen/Photo-SLAM.git\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n**Photo-SLAM编译**：\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\ncd /workspace/Photo-SLAM\nchmod +x ./build.sh\n./build.sh\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n\n\n### issues\n\n### custom datasets",

---


检查 `pytorch/pytorch` 镜像的 Python 环境：


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="search" data-tool-name="web_search">
<details>
            <summary>Tool use: **web_search** • Searched web `undefined` • **1** results</summary>
        
| Title | URL | Chunk |
|-------|-----|-------|
| Web Search Results |  | Starting with the 22.11 release, the official PyTorch Docker images no longer include a pre-installed Conda environment. All Python packages are now installed in the default Python environment. If your workflow requires Conda, you can manually install it within the Docker container. Here's how you can set up Conda and configure the Python path:<br/><br/>1. **Install Conda**: Download and install Miniconda within your Docker container.<br/><br/>   ```dockerfile<br/>   RUN wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -O /tmp/miniconda.sh && \<br/>       bash /tmp/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && \<br/>       rm /tmp/miniconda.sh<br/>   ```<br/><br/><br/>2. **Set Environment Variables**: Update the `PATH` and `PYTHONPATH` environment variables to include Conda.<br/><br/>   ```dockerfile<br/>   ENV PATH="/opt/conda/bin:$PATH"<br/>   ENV PYTHONPATH="/opt/conda/lib/python3.8/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"<br/>   ```<br/><br/><br/>   Replace `python3.8` with the appropriate Python version installed by Conda.<br/><br/>3. **Create and Activate a Conda Environment**: Create a new Conda environment and install PyTorch.<br/><br/>   ```dockerfile<br/>   RUN conda create -n pytorch_env python=3.8 && \<br/>       conda activate pytorch_env && \<br/>       conda install pytorch torchvision torchaudio -c pytorch<br/>   ```<br/><br/><br/>   Ensure that the Python version (`python=3.8`) matches the version used in the `PYTHONPATH`.<br/><br/>By following these steps, you can set up a Conda environment within the PyTorch Docker image and configure the Python path accordingly. This approach allows you to manage dependencies and environments effectively within your Docker container.<br/><br/>For more detailed guidance, you can refer to the [PyTorch Release Notes](https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/frameworks/pdf/PyTorch-Release-Notes.pdf) and the [Docker for PyTorch - Robotics Knowledgebase](https://roboticsknowledgebase.com/wiki/tools/docker-for-pytorch/). |

</details>
</tool-use>

---



---


分析与解决方案：

- 使用 `--no-cache-dir` 的原因：避免在 Docker 镜像中缓存 pip 包，节省空间；在手动执行时不是必需的。
- 找不到 torch 的原因：
  - 环境变量未继承：`dockerfile` 中通过 `ENV` 设置了 `CUDA_HOME` 和 `TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST`，但手动执行脚本时可能未继承。
  - Python 环境路径：`pytorch/pytorch:2.1.0` 可能使用 conda，torch 安装在 conda 环境中，手动执行可能未激活该环境。
  - 执行上下文：`postCreateCommand` 在 devcontainer 启动时执行会继承环境；手动执行可能缺少这些设置。

解决方案：修改 `post_exec.sh`，在脚本开头显式设置必要的环境变量，并确保使用正确的 Python 环境。


---

---



---


修改后的 `post_exec.sh`，确保手动执行时也能正确找到 torch：

```bash:Splat-SLAM/.devcontainer/post_exec.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -eux

echo ">>> Start of post install script <<<"

# 显式设置环境变量，确保手动执行时也能正确继承
export CUDA_HOME=${CUDA_HOME:-/usr/local/cuda}
export TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=${TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST:-"8.0+PTX"}
export PATH=${CUDA_HOME}/bin:${PATH}
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${CUDA_HOME}/lib64:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}

echo "Environment variables:"
echo "  CUDA_HOME: $CUDA_HOME"
echo "  TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST: $TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST"
echo "  Python: $(which python)"
echo "  Python version: $(python --version)"
echo "  pip: $(which pip)"

# 验证 torch 是否可用
echo "Verifying torch installation..."
if python -c "import torch; print(f'PyTorch version: {torch.__version__}'); print(f'CUDA available: {torch.cuda.is_available()}')" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "✓ PyTorch is available"
else
    echo "✗ PyTorch not found. Attempting to locate..."
    # 尝试查找 torch 安装位置
    python -c "import sys; print('Python path:', sys.path)" || true
    echo "Please ensure PyTorch is installed in the current Python environment."
    exit 1
fi

DISPLAY_EXPORT="export DISPLAY=:0"

if [[ ! -d "/workspace/Splat-SLAM" ]]; then
  echo "Cloning Splat-SLAM repository..."
  
  cd /workspace

  git clone --recursive https://github.com/iis-esslingen/Splat-SLAM.git

  cd /workspace/Splat-SLAM

  sed -i 's/p_view\.z <= 0\.2f/p_view\.z <= 0\.001f/' /workspace/Splat-SLAM/thirdparty/diff-gaussian-rasterization-w-pose/cuda_rasterizer/auxiliary.h && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir -e thirdparty/lietorch/ \
                                   thirdparty/diff-gaussian-rasterization-w-pose/ \
                                   thirdparty/simple-knn/ \
                                   thirdparty/evaluate_3d_reconstruction_lib/ && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir -e . && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir pytorch-lightning==1.9 --no-deps && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir gdown

  pip install gdown
  gdown "https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1oZbVPrubtaIUjRRuT8F-YjjHBW-1spKT" -O glorie-pretrained.zip
  unzip glorie-pretrained.zip -d pretrained
fi

echo ">>> End of post install script <<<"
```

主要改动：
1. 显式设置环境变量：在脚本开头设置 `CUDA_HOME`、`TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST`、`PATH`、`LD_LIBRARY_PATH`，使用 `${VAR:-default}` 确保有默认值。
2. 环境信息输出：打印关键环境变量和 Python/pip 路径，便于调试。
3. Torch 验证：在安装依赖前验证 torch 是否可用，若不可用则输出诊断信息并退出。

关于 `--no-cache-dir`：
- 在 Docker 构建时使用可减少镜像体积。
- 手动执行时不是必需的；若网络稳定，可去掉以加快后续安装。

如果仍有问题，可尝试：
1. 检查 Python 环境：确认使用的是系统 Python 还是 conda 环境。
2. 手动激活 conda（如适用）：
   ```bash
   source /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
   conda activate base  # 或相应的环境名
   ```

需要我直接应用这些修改吗？
